level.heading: Short title.
level.text: This chapter may be cited as the "Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act of 2010".

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 101 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act.
